Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the acquisition of career status by certain employees of the Federal Government serving under overseas limited appointments.

summary.text: Includes Federal employees serving under overseas limited appointments within those provisions relating to the acquisition of career appointments by individuals serving under temporary or indefinite appointments.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the acquisition of career status by certain employees of the Federal Government serving under overseas limited appointments.
